TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void EventArrivedEventHandler(object sender, EventArrivedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed EventArrivedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EventArrivedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As EventArrivedEventArgs)
public delegate void EventArrivedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, EventArrivedEventArgs ^ e);
type EventArrivedEventHandler = delegate of obj * EventArrivedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 要叫用此方法的物件執行個體。

span.span: The instance of the object for which to invoke this method.
The that specifies the reason the event was invoked.

summary.span: 代表將處理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下例會非同步設定 WMI 計時器，以引發事件，每秒，並移除不再需要時。The following asynchronous example sets up a WMI timer to raise an event every second, and removes it when no longer needed. 定義數個[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]傳遞 WMI 事件時引發的事件。The defines several [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] events which are raised when WMI events are delivered. 委派會附加至這些事件，以處理傳入資料。Delegates are attached to these events for handling the incoming data. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler/cs/EventArrivedEventHandler.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler/vb/EventArrivedEventHandler.vb#1)]
